Text:
Hi Jenson100!
Thank so much for sharing this great and helpful book on thyroid issue. I have a low thyroid and taking iodine to help the problem. I appreciate this book very much because I have so much questions that needed answers. 

You are amazing! Thank you for all your hard work and generous heart to share such great wealth of knowledge with us all. God bless to your heart. Have a great new year!!!!!

these days you have to take ownership of your diagnosis/care/maintenance... medicine misses so much and if you have multiple conditions your docs will all miss something.

Great upload... I'll read it just on general principles.

@bill_214 

True.I have similar thyroid issues so this book definitely does shed a lot more light on the problem.Most if not all doctors don't seem to understand that this condition is usually under treated, leaving people with symptoms.This book helps though.
